method: In a mixing bowl, combine flour, cocoa powder, sugar, baking powder, and salt.
Add milk and mix until well combined.
Spoon cake batter into cupcake liners, filling each halfway.
Place a surprise ingredient in the center of each cupcake.
Cover the surprise ingredient with more cake batter, filling each cupcake liner about ⅔ full.
Bake in the preheated oven for 15-20 minutes or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean.
Allow cupcakes to cool before serving.
